title: The Scullery Maid's Salvation
description: 1880s London After enduring years of neglect from her cold mother and cruel father, young Ebba flees their lodgings, preferring a life on the cold, snow-covered streets of her London slum to 'home'. Found barely alive by a young local lad, he takes it upon himself to get Ebba a maid's job at his parents' charity. The family does what it can to protect the girl, yet Ebba remains ever watchful of the shadows in case her selfish and vengeful father emerges from the darkness once more. Just as she begins to enjoy some peace in her life, she receives a tempting offer. It will guarantee her a better future and might set her free from her father for good. But can she leave the kind family who saved her life and say goodbye to her childhood sweetheart? --- Experience Ebba's emotional and inspiring journey to freedom as this strong woman bravely fights a world that works against her at every turn. Find out why those closest to her loathe her and why strangers become her saviours. This is a gritty, powerful, and uplifting story of resilience and courage, full of hope .Buy 'The Scullery Maid's Salvation' today and witness Ebba's inspiring transformation in the face of adversity.
author: Emma Hardwick
